data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in South Sikkim, Sikkim, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of South Sikkim, Sikkim, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 146,900 citizens of South Sikkim, Sikkim, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of South Sikkim, Sikkim, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in South Sikkim, Sikkim, India that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Singtam
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Singtam, Sikkim, India.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of South Sikkim, Sikkim, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of South Sikkim.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of South Sikkim to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
